11.<color_yellow>フウキの仲間の スキルについての説明です！|<br>:
This is an explanation of the skills of|Fuki's friends! You can assign skill points|and change additional skills to Fuki's|
|friends by using the "Fuki's Friends" command|in the "Operation" section... The "Skill|Allocation" command allows you to allocate|
